alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 12 at 10:48AM PST until January 12 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibilities in dense fog ranging from 800 feet to as low as 200 feet. * WHERE...Portions of the San Joaquin Valley, mainly over Fresno and Kings Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 198, Highway 41, Highway 43, Highway 180, Highway 152, and Highway 99 from McFarland northward.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Plan on extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore
